meaningMnemonic:
When you <kanji>open</kanji> something <kanji>seal</kanji>ed, you're <vocabulary>unsealing</vocabulary> it or <vocabulary>breaking a seal</vocabulary>.

開封 generally refers to opening something sealed, like opening a letter or package.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
